programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: Hosted by an all-star cast, It's Showtime is a variety show unlike any other. Watch as people from all over come on stage to showcase their skills and creativity in this one-of-a-kind talent show full of fun and prizes.

programme.title: Goin' Bulilit
programme.desc: This comical spin-off of the 80s comedy programme Goin' Bananas is currently the Philippines' most successful children's comedy show, created and directed by one of Goin' Bananas' original stars, Bobot Mortiz.

programme.title: Ang Sa Iyo Ay Akin
programme.desc: Marissa and Ellice are best friends who hail from different worlds: Ellice is from an influential family, while Marissa is a simple lass living with her mother Lucing. The two are inseparable until one night, a gruesome crime changes their destinies.

programme.title: Huwag Kang Mangamba
programme.desc: Two strangers' lives become entwined after they both return from apparent death due to a road crash.

programme.title: Isusumbong Kita Sa Tatay Ko
programme.desc: Joey believes that no one could ever break her bond with her father Badong, who has single-handedly raised her. Things change when a woman from Badong's past returns.

programme.title: TV Patrol Global Edition
programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: Kapamilya Daily Mass
programme.desc: A daily celebration of the Liturgy of the Lord.

programme.title: Gising Pilipinas Live
programme.desc: Spice up your morning with a rousing round-up of the biggest news stories and live reports from field correspondents.

programme.desc: Spice up your morning with a rousing round-up of the biggest news stories and live reports from field correspondents.

programme.title: Huwag Kang Mangamba
programme.desc: Two strangers' lives become entwined after they both return from apparent death due to a road crash.

programme.title: Akusada
programme.desc: Is the story of Carolina Astor, a resort staff who accidentally ‚Äúkills‚Äù Joi, a resort shareholder. Carolina goes into hiding and assumes a new identity - Lorena. Lorena moves on and starts a new life but her past will haunt her.

programme.title: Cruz vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: My Father's Wife
programme.desc: Two friends, Gina and Betsy, strike a deal: Gina will enter into a marriage of convenience with Betsy's boyfriend, Gerald, to help Betsy achieve her American dream. But when Gina and Gerald unexpectedly fall in love and choose to honor their vows, everything changes. Betrayed and furious, Betsy retaliates in the most shocking way‚Äîby marrying Gina's father. What begins as a calculated plan spirals

programme.title: Sanggang-Dikit FR
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.desc: The saga continues in the second season/installment of the classic Carlo J. Caparas' adaptation. Stars Kiko Estrada, Sarah Labahti, and Gardo Versoza.

programme.desc: The saga continues in the second season/installment of the classic Carlo J. Caparas' adaptation. Stars Kiko Estrada, Sarah Labahti, and Gardo Versoza.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 30
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back‚Äîeven if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 110
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: From the Beautiful Country ep 4
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari original series. Four beauty pageant contestants find themselves prime suspects when another contestant winds up dead. Each girl has her motive, but which one of them did it? And which one will end up with the crown?

programme.title: Di na Muli ep 10
programme.desc:
‚ÄòDi Na Muli tells the story of a young woman who tries to overcome her 
life's biggest regret (complicated by her special ability to see how much 
time remains of someone‚Äôs life) but ends up falling in love with the man 
who caused the death of her one great lov.

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 4
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 3
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.desc: Alex becomes a famous makeup artist because of her mother‚Äôs unique brush set but will face a challenge when all her clients begin to die, one by one.

programme.title: For the Love ep 1
programme.desc: An episodic TV series touching on various kinds of love stories based on modern hits and classics from Viva Records.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa Bagong Yugto ep 13
programme.desc: The saga continues in the second season/installment of the classic Carlo J. Caparas' adaptation. Stars Kiko Estrada, Sarah Labahti, and Gardo Versoza.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa Bagong Yugto ep 14
programme.desc: The saga continues in the second season/installment of the classic Carlo J. Caparas' adaptation. Stars Kiko Estrada, Sarah Labahti, and Gardo Versoza.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 31
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back‚Äîeven if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 111
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 4
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

business. Are the parents willing to accept change

programme.title: Beh Buti Nga ep 5
programme.desc: After making a fortune from Bitcoin, Axel gets back at the girls who once broke his heart. When he succeeds, he makes it a mission to help his high school barkada to become confident heartbreakers. However, things take a turn when Isabelle their only female friend in high school starts forming a bond with Axel and he falls in love with her for real.

programme.title: Destiny Guard ep 4
programme.desc: Angels of destiny work as security guards, matching people with their soul mates and making sure they end up together. But what if a female guard falls in love with a man under her watch?

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 112
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: From the Beautiful Country ep 5
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari original series. Four beauty pageant contestants find themselves prime suspects when another contestant winds up dead. Each girl has her motive, but which one of them did it? And which one will end up with the crown?

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 4
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 3
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.desc: Gagay's family collects wood and turns it into charcoal for profit. They become millionaires when they invent a coal-powered generator. Soon, they discover that money isn't everything.

programme.title: Kung Aagawin Mo Ang Lahat Sa Akin
It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Tiktoclock: Happy Hour Na
programme.desc: A game-variety show showcasing talents of Filipinos in singing, dancing and many more.

programme.title: Akusada
programme.desc: Is the story of Carolina Astor, a resort staff who accidentally ‚Äúkills‚Äù Joi, a resort shareholder. Carolina goes into hiding and assumes a new identity - Lorena. Lorena moves on and starts a new life but her past will haunt her.

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: My Father's Wife
programme.desc: Two friends, Gina and Betsy, strike a deal: Gina will enter into a marriage of convenience with Betsy's boyfriend, Gerald, to help Betsy achieve her American dream. But when Gina and Gerald unexpectedly fall in love and choose to honor their vows, everything changes. Betrayed and furious, Betsy retaliates in the most shocking way-by marrying Gina's father. What begins as a calculated plan spirals

programme.title: Sanggang
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: It features two families who compete to name the most popular answers to survey questions in order to win cash and prizes

programme.title: Fast Talk With Boy Abunda
programme.desc: The latest multi-platform showbiz news and talk show on Kapuso network.

programme.desc: Gives an up-to-the minute news here and around the world.

programme.title: Tadhana
programme.desc: An Overseas Filipino Workers themed weekly anthology that will dramatize the colorful, romantic, heroic, and inspiring stories of OFWs.

programme.title: Regal Studio Presents
programme.desc: A collection of weekly specials which feature timely, feel-good stories.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Kung Kailangan Mo Ako
programme.desc: The cranky and ill-natured Sharon Cuneta was the vital witness in a celebrated case and the guilty parties would do anything to put her away. While she had been trying to flee from her pursuers in a cab driven by Rudy Fernandez, they got into an accident, which made her lose her memory.

programme.title: Bagets 2 (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The Bagets were back bringing with them their new friends for merrier and wackier adventures. This time around, the boys went to the province for their vacation and found loads to laugh about, cry about, be scared about, be sick about, just about everything you could think of.

programme.title: Miss Na Miss Kita (Ang Utol Kong Hoodlum 2)
programme.desc: Together, Robin and Vina, created beautiful music. Together they were in constant danger because of certain people and certain events, which were taking place around them, but they were not aware of.

programme.title: Batangue√±o Kabitenyo
programme.desc: This is a story of Magno,who is from Batangas and has the ability to attract women like flies.He goes to Manila hoping to change.

programme.title: Working Girls (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: A humorous, but truly insightful look into the lives of women trying to make a living in the big city and coping with all the prejudice life bestowed on them because of their sex. This is also about their loves, their dreams, their weaknesses.

programme.title: Huwag Mong Itanong Kung Bakit
programme.desc: Aning (Cherie Gil) is a maid in the Cuevas household. She is raped by an unknown assailant and comes home to the province pregnant. Her older sister Dinya (Dina Bonnevie) serves the Cuevas household to search for the culprit.

programme.title: Oo Na Sige Na
programme.desc: When their relationship was discovered, Shirley was made to choose between father and boyfriend,Bonggoy.

programme.title: Kapitan Tumba
programme.desc: Roi Vinzon attained full stardom in Kapitan Tumba, the true-to-life controversial story of Capt. Jose Huevos of Bulacan.

programme.title: Dogtag: Katarungan Sa Aking Kamay
programme.desc: Dante (Jestoni Alarcon) and Jojo (Emilio Garcia) consider themselves more than brothers because of shared experiences they had as a soldiers.

programme.title: Kasalanan Bang Sambahin Ka
programme.desc: As a last fling before getting married, Alex (Julio Diaz) dates his friend's cousin Catherine (Vivian Velez). When Alex still marries his fiancee Grace (Dawn Zulueta), Catherine makes life difficult by creating a scandal.

programme.title: Ipagpatawad Mo
programme.desc: They were the ideal couple and seemed to lead the perfect life. But their son was not like the other normal children. How they came to terms with the presence of their autistic child in their lives, is the gist of this wonderfully crafted film.

programme.title: Mistah
programme.desc: Real-life brothers Robin and Rustom Padilla topbilled this action epic about the Muslim conflict in the Southern part of the Philippines. Though diverse in outlook, they shared the belief that all Filipinos were brothers, whether they are Muslims or Christians, and hence, should not be at war with each other.

programme.title: Wooly Booly 2 (Ang Titser Kong Alien)
programme.desc: The sequel to the succesful Wooly Booly, Ang Classmate Kong Alien. The story continues with Wooly Booly living happily on earth with his human girlfriend. One day, his girlfriend from his planet decides to visit earth with the aim of taking Wooly Booly back home.

programme.title: Neber 2-Geder
programme.desc: They were totally unlike in their ways and in the kind of girls they become attracted to. Andrew E and Redford White seemed like they were never together but each one was willing to do anything to help the other.

programme.title: Kamagong (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Arnis, the ancient Filipino martial art, took center stage in this coming of age drama wherein a young boy perfected his skills and his idol rediscovered what it takes to be a man.

programme.title: Buy One, Take One
programme.desc: Salve (Sharon) and Sion (Susan) are sisters living with their grandparents. One day, Salve's friend invites her to apply for abroad only to be tricked because it was an illegal recruitment agency selling women for foreigners.

programme.title: Balweg
programme.desc: In the war which ensued with the arrival of the military forces, Fr. Balweg was forced out of his parish and into the mountains, where he later became one of the most charismatic of leaders, admired by the masses, hated by the government and loved by many women.

programme.title: Bukas May Pangarap
programme.desc: A peasant couple set all their worldly possesions so that the husband can take advantage of an overseas job offer. But a tragedy is bound to bring his marriage and family life to ruin.

programme.title: Isla
programme.desc: Beauty Queen, Maria Isabel Lopez portrayed the role of Isla, the island maiden who has all the males, including her father, lusting after her. Her dream was to leave her primitive surroundings and find another life in the big city.

programme.title: Kaliwa't Kanan, Sakit Ng Katawan
programme.desc: Ruben and Lorena are still on their honeymoon stage, but she has already decided to take on family planning the natural way. Disappointed and desperate, he gets into an illicit relationship.

programme.title: Itanong Mo Sa Buwan
programme.desc: Josie is not really a victim but Angelito's lover. He then declares they planned the whole thing to finance a new life together. Who is telling the truth?

programme.title: Bangkay Mo Akong Hahakbangan
programme.desc: Join the King of Stunts, Dante Varona, on this deadly game on hide and seek and of vengeance and justice.

programme.title: Kung Aagawin Mo Ang Lahat Sa Akin
programme.desc: An intense rivalry has always existed between Jackie Lou and her older sister, Sharon, whom her parents had adopted before she was born. Their father believed the girls should be treated as equals but their mother, thought otherwise.

programme.title: Bahala Na Vs Sputnik
programme.desc: \"Bahala na\" and \"Sigue-Sigue Sputnik\" are two of the most wanted gangs decades ago. They fought more than any other notorious criminals. They fear no law and life for them is a life of violence. They have no Lords other than their brotherhood until their world self-destructed.

programme.title: Dugong Buhay (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Father and son were unknowingly pitted against each other in this tale of a man determined to hate his enemy all his life and who, one day, would exact revenge in the most cruel manner even if it took him years and years of plotting and waiting.
